column2: "Welcome back. Though it looks like you just did an errand for Kukka."
"What? They ALL had you do errands for them?"
"Huh? We're looking out for each other? What do you mean?"
"It's so pretty... I think I'll put it up somewhere."
"I'll have to remember to thank Taivas. Thanks for delivering it to me."
"Thanks for all your help today. Here, I want you to have this to show my gratitude."
"Sorry for relying on you all the time. See you around!"
